column3: anaa ɔdaasonyi bi soɛr wɔ wo mu
column4: na ɔma wo asɛnkyerɛdze anaa anwanwadze bi
column6: "na asɛnkyerɛdze anaa anwanwadze a ɔkasaa ho kyerɛɛ wo no ba mu
column8: Ma yɛnkɔ nkedzi enyame fofor a ɔwo nnyim hɔn no ekyir

column2: "mma nntsie nkɔnhyɛnyi no anaa ɔdaasonyi no nsɛm no: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn rosɔ hom ahwɛ
column3: dze ehu kyerɛ dɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara dɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Hom nnantsew ndzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ekyir
column4: na hom ndzi ne mbransɛm do
column6: na hom nsom no; na hom ntakyer no ho."

column4: wonku no; osiandɛ wɔaka etuatsew ho asɛm etsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a oyii hom fii Egypt asaase do
column5: na ɔpoon wo fii nkowaasom ofi mu no
column6: dɛ ɔdze rotwetwe wo efi ɔkwan a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo dɛ nantsew mu no do esi nkyɛn. Ama eetu bɔn no efi wo mu."
anaa wo yer a ɔda wo bo mu
column7: anaa wo nyɛnko a ɔtse dɛ wankasa wo kra
column10: Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔsom enyame fofor a ɔwo nye w’egyanom nnyim no;"

column2: "aman a woetwa hom ho ehyia a wɔbɛn wo
column4: ofi asaase ano kor ara kodu asaase ano kor so hɔn enyame mu bi a;"

column3: na nntsie no so; nkyii so mma w’enyiwa nnhu no mbɔbɔr

column2: "na oku na ku no; wo nsa na ondzi kan ntɔ no do dɛ woboku no
column3: na n’ekyir no na ɔman no nyinara nsa."

column2: "Na siw no abo ma onwu; osiandɛ ɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ ɔtwetwe wo fi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a oyii wo fii Egypt asaase do
column3: wɔ nkowaasom ofi mu no ho."

column4: na wɔannda ho ara annyɛ dɛm ndzebɔn a ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ iyi tse yi wɔ wo mu."

column2: "Na sɛ etse dɛ wɔreka wɔ wo nkurow a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ tsena mu hɔ no kor bi ho
column6: na wɔadaadaa hɔn kurow mu atsefo dɛ
column7: Hom mma yɛnkɔ nkɔsom enyame fofor a hom nnyim hɔn a;"

column3: na bisabisa mu yie; na hwɛ
column5: na asɛm no yɛ ampa dɛ dɛm ekyiwadze yi wɔayɛ no wɔ wo mu a:"

column2: "oku na fa nkrantsee ano ku kurow no mu atsefo no
column3: na fa nkrantsee ano sɛɛ no
column4: nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara nye no mu fiembowa so pasapasa."

column2: "Na boaboa no mu asadze nyinara ano wɔ no brɔn finimfin
column3: na fa gya hyew kurow no
column4: nye no mu asadze no nyinara dɛ ɔhyew afɔr mu
column5: fa ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn: na ɔnyɛ ɔmamfo daa; mma wɔnnkyekyer no bio."

column2: "Na mma ebusudze no mu bi mmfam wo nsa ho: ama EWURADZE aadan efi n’ebufuhyew no ho
column5: na ɔaama adɔr dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka ntam akyerɛ w’egyanom;"

column2: "sɛ a itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze
column3: dɛ idzi ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do
column4: na eyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyiwa do a."
